verses.roman:
paṇḍitera saujanya, brahmaṇyatā-guṇa
dṛḍha prema-mudrā loke karilā khyāpana

synonyms: paṇḍitera saujanya—the gentle behavior of Gadādhara Paṇḍita; brahmaṇyatā-guṇa—the attributes of a perfect brāhmaṇa; dṛḍha—firm; prema-mudrā—characteristic of love; loke—people; karilā khyāpana—proclaimed.
translation: Gadādhara Paṇḍita is celebrated all over the world for his gentle behavior, his brahminical attributes and his steady love for Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu.
